main.name: Alexander Pettersson
main.description: A passionate designer who loves to develop three-dimensional models, animations, and visual effects for game-focused applications.
main.bio: I'm currently based in Borås, Sweden. I enjoy working with individuals looking for building their game dream vision to become true. I graduated from LBS Borås as Game Graphic Designer.
main.contactmessage: PLease feel free to contact me clicking the mail icon.
